title: Allama Zameer Akhtar Naqvi passes away in Karachi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 13 (APP): Renowned religious scholar and preacher Allama Zameer Akhtar Naqvi passed away in Karachi on Sunday after Cardiac arrest.
As per details, he reportedly suffered a heart attack and was shifted to the Aga Khan University Hospital Saturday night, news channels reported.
The family sources said that the religious figure Allama Syed Zameer Akhtar Naqvi died of cardiac arrest. He was taken to a private hospital where he took his last breath.
